params.amountIn: Amount of tokenIn to be converted
params.tokenIn: Address of an ERC20 token contract to be converted
params.tokenOut: Address of an ERC20 token contract to convert into
params.twapPeriod: Number of seconds in the past to consider for the TWAP rate, if applicable

returns.amountOut: Amount of tokenOut received for amountIn of tokenIn

params.amountIn: Amount of token to be converted

returns._0: price of the token in USDC

assetToAsset(address,uint256,address,uin.notice: Given a token and its amount, return the equivalent value in another token

getPrice(string,uint256).notice: Given a token, return the price of the token
